en.title: FE's New Service Centre In Kajang
en.content:
REPORT BY FE LEADER MORITS CHIN. 

On 17th July 2009, FE's new Service Centre in Kajang was opened by FE Leaders Morits Chin, Yap Cheng Fui, Foo Yong Meng & Ken Chen. The function was graced by presence of Presidential Director Alan Yeo, Executive Director Sam Kok Onn & FE Spokeswoman Champion Para Athlete Ms Law King Kiew.

The service centre was packed with many new prospects. They were all amazed at FE's Quantum Pendant demos performed by PD Alan Yeo. FE Spokeswoman Ms Law King Kiew & PD Peter Chin shared powerful testimonies on their wonderful experiences with FE's Quantum Pendant.

Lucky draws of hampers & FE Quantum Pendants were presented to the lucky ones at the meeting. Overall it was a successful opening. Many sets of QP were sold that night including the signing up of a new stockist. 

FE Leaders of Kajang Service Centre expresses their thanks to FusionExcel International HQ, PDs Alan Yeo, Peter Chin, ED Sam Kok Onn, FE Spokeswoman Ms Law King Kiew and all their members for the support given
at the opening of the new service centre.

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
meta.author: klhunter
